enterprise.meta.title: Supabase for Enterprise
enterprise.meta.description: Leading enterprises use Supabase to build faster, better, and more scalable products.
enterprise.hero.title: Supabase for Enterprise
enterprise.hero.heading: Innovative Enterprises use Supabase
enterprise.hero.subheader: Leading enterprises use Supabase to build faster, better, and more scalable products. From GitHub to PwC, innovative companies trust Supabase to drive their digital transformation strategy.
enterprise.useCases.label: Build with Supabase
enterprise.useCases.heading: Stay on the forefront
enterprise.useCases.stories.mozilla.head: Mozilla use Supabase for GenAI and RAG
enterprise.useCases.stories.mozilla.subh: We store embeddings in a PostgreSQL database, hosted by Supabase, to perform a similarity search to identify the most relevant sections within the MDN.
enterprise.useCases.stories.epsilon3.hea: Epsilon3 use Supabase to build software for NASA
enterprise.useCases.stories.epsilon3.sub: Billion dollar missions need to run reliably and securely. We use Supabase because they give us an open-source scalable back-end built by database experts that we can self-host.
enterprise.useCases.stories.pebblely.hea: Pebblely use Supabase to scale to millions of users.
enterprise.useCases.stories.pebblely.sub: It streamlined the database, the API, and authentication. Everything was up and running in two days. It is easy to get started and provides all the solutions we require as we continue to grow.
enterprise.useCases.highlights.scale.sub: Maergo handled 100x their highest sustained traffic with Supabase.
enterprise.useCases.highlights.cost.head: 83% cost reduction
enterprise.useCases.highlights.cost.subh: Shotgun reduced costs by 83% by migrating to Supabase.
enterprise.useCases.highlights.developme: Voypost enjoyed a 20% faster development process.
enterprise.useCases.highlights.complianc: Markprompt use Supabase to build GDPR-compliant AI chatbots.
enterprise.performance.heading: Top performance, at any scale
enterprise.performance.subheading: Supabase ensures optimal database performance at any scale, so you can focus on innovating and growing without worrying about infrastructure limitationsâ€”whether you're handling high-traffic applications, complex queries, or massive data volumes.
enterprise.security.label: Security
enterprise.security.heading: Trusted for medical records, missions to the moon, and everything in between
enterprise.security.subheading: Keep your data secure with SOC 2, HIPAA, and GDPR compliance. Your customers' data is encrypted at rest and in transit, with built-in tools for monitoring and managing security threats.
enterprise.support.label: Support
enterprise.support.heading: Get expert help, whenever you need it
enterprise.support.features.global.subhe: Our team has 100% global coverage. No matter where you are, we're always available to resolve issues and keep your operations running smoothly.
enterprise.support.features.dedicated.su: Get direct access to talented engineers. From onboarding to optimizations, our expert team is here to provide personalized, hands-on support whenever you need it.
enterprise.support.features.migration.su: Our team ensures a smooth transition to Supabase while guiding you with best practices for scaling. We're dedicated to your long-term success, every step of the way.
enterprise.quote.text: Supabase powers prototyping for fast-moving teams such as GitHub Next.
enterprise.quote.author: Idan Gazit
enterprise.quote.role: Senior Director of Research, GitHub Next
enterprise.demo.heading: Request a demo
enterprise.demo.subheading: We can take your requirements and show you how Supabase can help you achieve your goals.

enterprise.demo.title: Request a demo
enterprise.demo.description: We can take your requirements and show you how Supabase can help you achieve your goals.
enterprise.quotes.goodtape.quote: My biggest regret is not having gone with Supabase from the beginning.
enterprise.quotes.goodtape.author: Jakob Steinn, Co-founder & Tech Lead, Good Tape
enterprise.quotes.xendit.quote: The full solution was built and in production in less than one week.
enterprise.quotes.xendit.author: Developer, Xendit
enterprise.quotes.chatbase.quote: Supabase is great because it has everything. I don't need a different solution for authentication, a different solution for database, or a different solution for storage.
enterprise.quotes.chatbase.author: Yasser Elsaid, Founder, Chatbase
